Package pdamianik.model

Class WordTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdamianik.model.WordTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class WordTrainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A word trainer that stores combinations of a word in form of a string and a image displaying the meaning of the word as an URL and compares a provided word with the selected word
    Version:
    2020-09-16
    Author:
    Philip Damianik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WordTrainer()
      Initializes the stats array with two zero values
      WordTrainer​(WordList wordList, WordEntry selectedWordEntry, int[] stats)
      Initializes the word trainer with values (to load the word trainer from a save file)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a new entry to the pool for the random selectable entries
      boolean check​(java.lang.String word)
      Checks if a string matches with the word from the selected WordEntry (case-sensitive)

      • getStats

        public int[] getStats()
        Returns the statistics of the current game of word trainer
        Returns:
        an array of integers that contains the total count of checked words and the amount of checked words that have been wrong
